RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 1 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 66. Maiden Special Weight Purse 29400. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 120 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JUBAWITHATWIST was hustled to the front past the three eighths pole and dueled clear toward the quarter, widened at the rail on the turn and was steadily handled in the lane. POWERED BY LOVE gave chase past the three eighths pole, steadied at the five sixteenth and rounded the turn near the rail and could only close the gap in an even finish. LOVE IS WICKED chased through the backstretch, raced at the rail into the turn, angled to the five path toward the head of the lane and came along to take third inside the sixteenth pole. CHRISTOPHER'SHEART chased, raced two deep on the turn then flattened mid-stretch. WYSOQUIET gave chase, raced near the rail on the turn and showed little in the lane. GREATEST NOTION chased through the backstretch, raced in the six path on the turn and had little left. CANDY FOR JUBA gave chase then faded in the five path on the turn. DIRECT PROOF gave chase and rounded the turn about the four path. BOUNDTONOONE gave chase and raced in the two and three paths on the turn. BRADLEY DO RIGHT came away a step slow and saved ground.

ENTRY.NAME: Jubawithatwist
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled to front past 3/8,widened rail turn,steady handling lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 2 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 74. Allowance Purse 31600. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 30 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since April 30 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Whe re Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MUSIC LASS took the lead nearing the three quarter pole and moved to the inside to rate the pace, came under pressure leaving the three eighths pole, dueled clear past the five sixteenths and was kept alert through the stretch. SLEWING was a bit reluctant to load then stalked from the three path, challenged leaving the seven sixteenths pole, rounded the far turn in the three path and dug in down the lane to hold second. NO DENYING DENIS settled inside on the opening turn, picked up the chase leaving the three eighths pole, raced in the three path of the far turn and ran evenly in the lane. STRONG WILLED stalked two deep, challenged leaving the seven sixteenths pole but dropped back past the five sixteenths, raced off the rail on the far turn and flattened in the lane. MARINA GRANDE entered the first turn about the five path then moved to the inside and gave chase from the nine sixteenths pole, rounded the far turn off the rail, eased to the outside toward the head of the lane but showed little more. YOLO CHARLOTTE rounded the first turn in the four path, picked up the chase leaving the seven sixteenths then weakened in the four path of the far turn. JUBA BABY rated close off the rail on the opening turn, rallied to contention at the rail nearing the three eighths pole but faded on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Marina Grande
ENTRY.OWNER: Jay A Reese LLC and Hatter Edgar

ENTRY.NAME: Music Lass
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated pace inside,pressured 3/8,dueled clear past 5/16,kept alert

ENTRY.NAME: Juba Baby
ENTRY.OWNER: Two Ten Twelve Triple T Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated close off rail,up to contend 3/8,faded rail far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Strong Willed
ENTRY.OWNER: Nikki Horses Racing and Fanelli John

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 3 7F Dirt CR: 55. Maiden Special Weight Purse 29400. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHARLEMAGNE stalked two deep then challenged leaving the seven sixteenths pole, took the nod toward the quarter, drew clear into the lane and was steadily handled to hold on well. NEVER FOR SPEIGHT rated close in the three path, gave chase nearing the seven sixteenths pole, raced in the three path on the far turn then dug in through the lane to hold second. DIVINAS CONNECTION exchanged contact with Major Nelson leaving the gate and rounded the opening turn in the four path, picked up the chase from the seven sixteenths pole, raced in the four path on the far turn and ran evenly in the stretch. RUSH TO CANDY settled off the rail, bid nearing the three eighths pole and entered the far turn at the rail, angled to the five path into the lane and finished evenly outside. MAJOR NELSON exchanged contact with Divinas Connection leaving the gate, rounded the first turn in the three path then gave chase from the seven sixteenths pole, came through the far turn in the three path and showed little in the lane. LET'S EAT rated the pace inside, was met nearing the seven sixteenths pole and dueled with the advantage from that point, but gave up the lead approaching the quarter pole and weakened into the lane. SHAKIN IT BIG TIME settled inside on the first turn and showed little response through the backstretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Rush to Candy
ENTRY.COMMENT: bid near 3/8,rail far turn,angled 5p 1/8,even finish outside

ENTRY.NAME: Never for Speight
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated close 3p,chased 7/16,3p far turn,dug in lane,held 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Major Nelson
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped break,3p 1st turn,chased 7/16,3p far turn,empty lane

ENTRY.NAME: Divinas Connection
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped break,4p 1st turn,chased 7/16,4p far turn,evenly lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 4 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 82. Allowance Purse 30500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, WAIVER CLAIMING, RESTRICTED OR STATE BRED RACES OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 30 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since April 30 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances)(W V A Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OX DOC moved in and rated a slim lead through the backstretch, cleared into the turn and held on under steady stretch handling. DAY THE MUSIC DIED gave chase through the backstretch, raced in the five path on the turn, drifted outward under left hand pressure through the stretch but dueled the final sixteenth for second. SHAMELESS RISK chased through the backstretch, rounded the turn about the six path, came inside the errant path of Day The Music Died mid-stretch and was outfinished for second the final sixteenth. DAN THE MAN CAN exchanged contact with Showtime Cat leaving the gate then gave chase, raced close off the rail on the turn then flattened later yards. SETTLEMENT DATE gave chase, raced in the three path on the turn and ran evenly down the lane. BODYSLAM gave chase, raced off the rail on the turn, eased out into the stretch and finished evenly. STORM TRAPPE moved in and gave chase through the backstretch but checked in tight at the rail leaving the five sixteenths pole and weakened leaving the turn. SHOWTIME CAT came away awkwardly and exchanged contact with Dan The Man Can then gave chase outside and rounded the turn in the six path. The Stewards reviewed, and rejected a claim of foul against the rider of Day The Music Died for stretch interference, lodged by the rider of Shameless Risk.

ENTRY.NAME: Dan the Man Can
ENTRY.OWNER: A and B Racing Stable LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped break,chased,close off rail turn,flattened later yards

ENTRY.NAME: Ox Doc
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved in,rated pace,cleared into turn,held on driving

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Calumet Farm & Dr. & Mrs. Charles Huber

ENTRY.NAME: Shameless Risk
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Nicole and Brown Ronney W

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 5 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 46. Maiden Claiming Purse 14400. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500, if for $7,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MEETMARYSMAN took a quick lead and moved to the inside to rate the pace, was under a mild hand ride leaving the seven sixteenths pole, came under pressure into the far turn and was steadily handled through most of the lane, then taken in hand the final yards. ASTRAYAL stumbled leaving the gate then stalked four wide on the opening turn, picked up the chase approaching the three eighths pole, rounded the far turn off the rail and held on for second. CURB THAT TIGER exchanged contact with Colonial Road leaving the gate and raced off the rail on the first turn, picked up the chase leaving the seven sixteenths pole, rounded the far turn in the four and five paths and finished evenly while gaining on the runner-up. CRUISE ON BY stalked three wide on the first turn, gave chase from the seven sixteenths pole, raced off the rail on the far turn and showed little in the lane. BAND TOUR stalked off the rail on the opening turn, gave chase leaving the seven sixteenths pole, raced at the rail on the far turn and weakened in the lane. COLONIAL ROAD exchanged contact with Curb That Tiger leaving the gate, rounded the first turn in the five path and showed little response through the backstretch. A BIT OF HARLOW saved ground, picked up the chase from the seven sixteenths pole, raced at the rail on the far turn and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Curb That Tiger
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped break,off rail,chased 7/16,4& 5p far turn,even finish

ENTRY.NAME: Meetmarysman
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick lead,rated pace,hand urged 7/16,pressured 1/4,in hand late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 6 7F Dirt CR: 72. Allowance Purse 30500. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 30 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since April 30 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $12,50 0 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GRUMPY'S BUDDY rounded the opening turn in the four path, started a bid approaching the three eighths pole, raced in the five path on the far turn and dug in under steady handling to get up the final yards. TREASURER stalked two deep then challenged approaching the three eighths pole, dueled to even terms midway on the far turn and dug in determinedly to eke out the advantage over I'LLTAKECAREOFIT, while outfinished for the win. The latter took the lead and moved to the inside to rate the pace, came under pressure past the three eighths pole, was met midway on the far turn and dug in gamely to the finish. O'RIGSBY rounded the first turn about the three path, picked up the chase from the seven sixteenths pole and raced off the rail on the far turn, eased out past the eighth pole and finished evenly to pass rivals. GATTO BE PROUD rated close off the rail the first turn, gave chase nearing the three eighths pole, rounded the far turn at the rail then flattened later yards. I'M THE MONEY MAN rated close inside on the first turn, gave chase nearing the three eighths pole, raced at the rail on the far turn and showed little further. DON'TCALLTOOEARLY rounded the first turn in the four path, gave chase from the seven sixteenths pole, raced in the four path on the far turn and showed little more. TURTLE DOVE stalked three wide, gave chase approaching the three eighths pole, rounded the far turn about the three path and weakened into the lane. FELICIAS CASTLE showed little response through the backstretch. LIEUTENANT BROWN saved ground.

ENTRY.NAME: O'Rigsby
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3p 1st turn,chased 7/16,off rail far turn,eased out 1/8,even fnsh

ENTRY.NAME: Gatto Be Proud
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated close,chased 3/8,rail far turn,flattened later yards

ENTRY.NAME: I'lltakecareofit
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated pace inside,pressured 3/8,met mid turn,gamely lane

ENTRY.NAME: Turtle Dove
ENTRY.OWNER: CM Racing and Jones Jr Michael E

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 7 7F Dirt CR: 100. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 32700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, WAIVER CLAIMING, RESTRICTED OR STATE BRED RACES OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $25,000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. No n-winners Of A Race Since May 30 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since April 30 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Races Where Entered For $20,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances)(W V A Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COASTAL MISSION stalked inside on the opening turn, raced hemmed in leaving the turn but eased out with a bid approaching the five sixteenths pole, took the lead two deep midway on the far turn, raced clear leaving the turn and was kept alert through the lane. ALPHA CHI RHO stalked from the four path the first turn, gave chase nearing the three eighths pole and took a brief lead at the five sixteenths, was met at the rail midway on the far turn, dropped back into the lane and settled for second best. MR THRIFTY raced well back off the rail on the first turn, picked up the chase toward the seven sixteenths pole, rounded the far turn about the four path and came along to take third later yards. ROCKET APPEAL stalked three wide, gave chase nearing the three eighths pole, rounded the far turn at the rail then flattened in the lane. OVERLY CRITICAL saved early ground, bid leaving the seven sixteenths pole, raced in the six path on the far turn and passed rivals widest. RAD PAISLEY stalked two deep on the first turn, gave chase nearing the three eighths pole, took a slim brief lead while between horses approaching the five sixteenths but dropped back at the quarter pole and faded on the far turn. ISHIHARA raced off the rail on the opening turn and showed little response through the backstretch. KENNY HAD A NOTION rounded the first turn in the four and five path, picked up the chase from the seven sixteenths pole but showed little response. HIS NAME IS SUE rated the pace inside, came under pressure toward the three eighths pole, was met approaching the five sixteenths pole and gave way at the rail.

ENTRY.NAME: Coastal Mission
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside,hemmed in 1/2,bid 5/16,up 2d mid turn,kept alert

ENTRY.NAME: Mr Thrifty
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back off rail,chased 7/16,4p far turn,along 3rd later yards

ENTRY.NAME: Overly Critical
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground,bid 7/16,6p far turn,passed rivals widest

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 8 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 57. Claiming Purse 17500. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 30 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000, For Each $1,000 To $8,000 1 lb. (Races Where Entered For $6,250 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).

CLAIM.OWNER: Eastham Richard and Brown Ronney W

RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAKINLIMMARGARITAS took the lead nearing the three quarter pole and moved to the inside entering the first turn to rate the pace, was hand urged leaving the five sixteenths, widened at the rail on the far turn then steadily handled in the lane. APPEALING ROAD rounded the opening turn about the three path, started a bid leaving the seven sixteenths pole, raced off the rail on the far turn and cleared second later yards while gaining on the winner. DEREKA'S BLUFF rounded the first turn in the four path, gave chase nearing the three eighths pole, raced in the three path on the far turn and relented in the stretch duel for second. DENALI D'ORO settled off the pace inside, picked up the chase approaching the three eighths pole, rounded the far turn near the rail and showed little in the lane. GOLDEN SALLY leapt from the gate then saved ground, gave chase toward the three eighths pole, raced at the rail on the far turn and passed rivals. SHOWTHEMONEYHONEY rated close inside on the opening turn, gave chase from the seven sixteenths pole, rounded the far turn at the rail and weakened in the lane. AMELIA'S DREAM raced in the five path the opening turn and showed little response through the backstretch. IT'S A REAL HONOR raced off the rail on the first turn and showed little response. WARRIORINTHEHOUSE saved ground.

ENTRY.NAME: Denali d'Oro
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace inside,chased 3/8,rail far turn,empty lane

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Sally
ENTRY.COMMENT: leapt break,saved ground,chased 3/8,rail far turn,passed rivals

ENTRY.NAME: Makinlimmargaritas
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated pace inside,hand urged 5/16,widened turn,driving finish
